Metadata: This exhibit is now gone and there is no photographic record clear enough to read

The exhibit titled "The VENTS Program" (displayed at the Hatfield Marine Science Center Visitor Center in Newport, Oregon) shows the work of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration'â€‹s VENTS Program which studies undersea vents using remotely operated vehicles. The display includes models of ships and the Alvin and ROPOS submersibles.
